org.restlet.ext.javamail

Class RepresentationMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.mail.Message
      • javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage
        • org.restlet.ext.javamail.RepresentationMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.mail.internet.MimePart, javax.mail.Part
    Deprecated. 
    Will be removed in next major release.

    @Deprecated
public class RepresentationMessage
extends javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage
    JavaMail MIME message based on an XML representation. For the XML format, see the JavaMailClientHelper class.
    Author:
    Jerome Louvel
